objects.text:
• 100% Pure, Fresh Whole Milk
• Rich and Creamy Texture
• No Artificial Hormones
• Farm-to-Table Freshness
Don't Miss Out on Premium Grade A Milk!

product_details.name: Farm Fresh Dairy Delight: Premium Grade A Whole Milk
product_details.description:
• 100% Pure, Fresh Whole Milk
• Rich and Creamy Texture
• Excellent Source of Calcium and Vitamin D
• No Artificial Hormones or Additives
• Farm-to-Table Freshness Guaranteed
• Available in Multiple Sizes: Glass Bottle and Pitcher Options
• Perfect for Cooking, Baking, and Direct Consumption
• Locally Sourced from Premium Dairy Farms
• BPA-Free Glass Packaging
• Ideal for Healthy Families and Active Lifestyles

banner_details:
The banner presents a farm-fresh milk advertisement with a clean and modern layout, designed to highlight freshness, purity, and urgency. The composition starts with a bold, prominent headline (`heading`) at the top in a deep blue font, followed by a playful and inviting subheading (`subheading`) in green. A neat bullet list (`description`) conveys key product features such as purity and creamy texture. An orange tagline (`tagline`) adds urgency, while a green promotional line (`call_to_action_text`) reinforces product quality. The banner concludes with the highlighted price (`price`) and a bold call-to-action button (`cta`, `cta_background`). A realistic product image (`product_image`) anchors the layout visually. The background includes soft, overlapping circles and wave lines, enhancing the freshness theme.

**Color Palette:**
- Deep Blue: #1A5F7A
- Light Aqua: #C5E8F2
- Teal Green: #52AB98
- Cream White: #F7F5F2
- Coral Orange: #E76F51
- Soft Grey-Black: #333333
product_color: The product image showcases a fresh, clean, and minimalist color palette ideal for an advertisement banner. Dominant whites from the milk (#FAFAF5) convey purity, health, and freshness. The transparent glass vessels introduce subtle blue hues (#A4C6E7 on the bottle neck and handle), reflecting coolness and hygiene. Light gray tones (#E0E0E0) from the reflections balance the contrast and make the white milk stand out. The colors are harmoniously blended, with soft edges and gradients, yet highlighted through light reflections and glass transparency. This combination makes the image feel pure, premium, and refreshing. Ideal complementary palette: white, light blue, pale gray, and silver.
